ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 1 Year Warranty and FREE Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
Package Includes: •	GW7204C DVR with 500G HDD •	GWLED19IN  - FREE 19" Wide Screen LED monitor •	2 x GW734V - 1/3" SHARP CCD Camera •	1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC •	1 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC •	2 x GW12V0.5A: 12V0.5A Power Supply for Security Cameras
2 Camera with build-in Microphones. 1/3" SHARP CCD, 600 TV lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs.
DVR Support up to 4 Channels, with 500G HDD included. Support HDMI & VGA outputs. All 4CH have D1 Recroding + D1 Playback
iPhone/Android Viewable
